captions.text: >>IF OUR BOYS DON'T MAKE IT UP THERE SOON WELL,
LET'S JUST SAY I'M NOT GOING TO MAKE IT TO THAT MICHAEL BUBLÉ CONCERT.

>>I'M GOING TO PRETEND YOU MENTIONED SOMEONE
MUCH COOLER.
>>YOU'RE WALKING A LITTLE FUNNY RIGHT NOW.
DID YOU EAT SOMETHING WEIRD TODAY?
GUYS, THIS IS HOW I NORMALLY WALK.
>>AND KEEP YOUR ARMS BY YOUR SIDE.
>>YOU'RE REALLY KILLING THE MOOD RIGHT NOW.
>>I DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU GUYS ARE TALKING ABOUT.

WE'LL DO BEFORE POSSIBLY DYING ALL-ALONE IN
SPACE.
I WANT US TO LOOK AS COOL AS POSSIBLE.
>>I HONESTLY DON'T KNOW HOW ELSE TO WALK.
>>YOU CAN'T THINK OF ANYTHING EXCEPT FOR
>>ALL RIGHT, JUST PAY ATTENTION TO HOW
WE'RE WALKING AND THEN JUST DO YOUR BEST TO MIMIC THAT.
>>I'M SORRY. I'M JUST IN MY HEAD NOW.
I SWEAR I CAN WALK LIKE AN HOUR AGO.
>>MY SUPER HOT NEIGHBOR IS HERE RIGHT NOW.
SHE CANNOT SEE ME LIKE THIS.
WE'RE GOING TO GO BACK TO THE BEGINNING EVERYONE
GUYS, I THINK WE'RE ON KIND OF A TIME CRUNCH.

>>SORRY WON'T EARN ME HOT NEIGHBOR LADY'S
RESPECT.
>>LISTEN, THE FATE OF THE WORLD RESTS ON OUR  SHOULDERS.
DOES IT REALLY MATTER HOW AWESOME WE LOOK
